mapper.insert: insert into trainee_fitness_goals (trainee_id, job_activity_level, exercise_days, preferred_exercise_intensity, created_at, updated_at, number_1_goal, other_goals, success_plan, current_exercise_plan, fitness_interests, disliked_fitness_activities) values (#{traineeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jobActivityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exerciseDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preferredExerciseIntensity,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{number1Goal,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{otherGoals,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{successPlan,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{currentExercisePlan,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{fitnessInterests,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{dislikedFitnessActivities,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update trainee_fitness_goals set job_activity_level = #{jobActivityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exercise_days = #{exerciseDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, preferred_exercise_intensity = #{preferredExerciseIntensity,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, number_1_goal = #{number1Goal,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, other_goals = #{otherGoals,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, success_plan = #{successPlan,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, current_exercise_plan = #{currentExercisePlan,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, fitness_interests = #{fitnessInterests,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, disliked_fitness_activities = #{dislikedFitnessActivities,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where trainee_id = #{traineeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select trainee_id, job_activity_level, exercise_days, preferred_exercise_intensity, created_at, updated_at, number_1_goal, other_goals, success_plan, current_exercise_plan, fitness_interests, disliked_fitness_activities from trainee_fitness_goals where trainee_id = #{traineeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select trainee_id, job_activity_level, exercise_days, preferred_exercise_intensity, created_at, updated_at, number_1_goal, other_goals, success_plan, current_exercise_plan, fitness_interests, disliked_fitness_activities from trainee_fitness_goals
